answers.answer: HiFrothy and foamy urine may be indicative of loss of proteins in urine. It may be seen in diabetes and nephrotic syndrome. The other symptoms of nephrotic syndrome include unexplained weight loss, malaise, swelling in the abdomen, legs and eyelids, dizziness, etc.You should consult a doctor for a complete examination and get a urine test done.Take care

question: Lately I seem to have some foamy urine. The amount of foam also varies. My urine color is normally ranges from yellow to light yellow but sometimes it looks like a light green color but they all have some amount of foam or bubbles.
title: Is my urine healthy?
